00033 namespace base {
00034 
00035 typedef mtl::dense1D<base::Real> Vector;
00036 typedef mtl::dense1D<base::Int> IVector;
00037 
00038 template <class T>
00039 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const mtl::dense1D<T>& v) // Output
00040 { 
00041   out << "[";
00042   for(Int i=0; i<v.size(); i++)
00043     out << v[i] << ((i!=v.size()-1)?",":"]");
00044   return out;
00045 }

00048 } // base
